Package nl.knaw.dans.layerstore

package nl.knaw.dans.layerstore
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractRunner
    Base class for command runners.
    Archive
    An archive is a file that contains a collection of files and directories.
    ArchiveProvider
    Provides a way to create an Archive.
    ConsistencyCheckingAsyncLayerArchiver
    A LayerArchiver that archives layers in a separate thread.
    DatabaseBackedContentManager
    Controls selecting and pre- and post-processing content for storage in the database.
    DirectLayerArchiver
    A LayerArchiver that archives layers directly (synchronously), not performing any consistency checks.
    DirectoryTreeItemIterator
    An iterator that traverses a directory tree and yields Items representing files and directories.
    DmfTarArchive
    Implementation of Archive that uses the dmftar command line tool to create and read DMF TAR archives.
    DmfTarArchiveItemIterator
    An iterator that traverses the entries of a DMF TAR archive and yields Items representing files and directories.
    DmfTarArchiveProvider
    An ArchiveProvider that uses the dmftar command line tool to create and read DMF TAR archives.
    DmfTarRunner
    A runner for the dmftar command line tool, which creates and reads DMF TAR archives on a remote host via SSH.
    Filter<T>
    A generic filter interface.
    Item
    A file or directory in the layer store.
    Item.ItemBuilder
     
    Item.Type
    The type of the item.
    ItemRecord
    A record in the database that represents a file or directory (i.e., Item) in a layer.
    ItemRecord.ItemRecordBuilder
     
    ItemsMatchDbConsistencyChecker
    Checks that the items found on storage are the same as the items found in the database for the layer.
    ItemsMismatchException
    Exception thrown when the items in the database and the items in the storage do not match.
    ItemStore
    An ItemStore stores "Items", which are files and directories.
    Layer
    This interface represents a layer in the LayeredItemStore.
    LayerArchiver
    Interface for archiving layers.
    LayerConsistencyChecker
    Checks the consistency of a layer on storage as compared to the database.
    LayerDatabase
    Provides access to the database that contains an ItemRecord for every file and directory (i.e., Item) stored in the layered storage.
    LayerDatabaseImpl
    An implementation of LayerDatabase that uses a PersistenceProvider to store ItemRecords.
    LayeredItemStore
    An implementation of ItemStore that organizes files and directories (Items) in an ordered stack of Layers.
    LayerIdsMismatchException
    Exception thrown when the layer ids in the database and the layer ids in the storage do not match.
    LayerManager
    Manages Layers.
    LayerManagerImpl
    Default implementation of the LayerManager interface.
    NoopDatabaseBackedContentManager
    A DatabaseBackedContentManager that does nothing.
    SshRunner
    A runner for the ssh command line tool, which executes commands on a remote host via SSH.
    StagingDir
    A very light-weight wrapper around a Path that represents a layer staging directory.
    TarArchive
    Implementation of Archive for TAR archives.
    TarArchiveItemIterator
    An iterator that iterates over the Items in a tar archive.
    TarArchiveProvider
    An ArchiveProvider that creates and reads TAR archives.
    ZipArchive
    Implementation of Archive for ZIP archives.
    ZipArchiveItemIterator
    An iterator that iterates over the Items in a zip archive.
    ZipArchiveProvider
    An ArchiveProvider that creates and reads ZIP archives.
